Entry.JapaneseText: 儀式が始まる前にクレアさんを 助けなければ……カレギア城に向かうぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: We need to save Claire before the ritual begins... Let's go to Callegea Castle!

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、女王が何を企んでるのか知らねえけど、 ろくでもないもんに決まってるからな！
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, I have no idea what the Queen has planned, but it can't be anything good!
